Title: Relates to the use of funds and payments from the IOLA fund
Summary: Relates to the use of funds and payments from the IOLA fund; provides that funds and payments shall not be used for any other purpose other than as stated in section 97-v of the state finance law.
LawCode: Amd ยง97-v, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the use of funds and payments from the IOLA fund
